name.en: Alien Count of the White Dwarf, St. Germain
name.ja: <ruby>白<rt>はく</rt></ruby><ruby>色<rt>しょく</rt></ruby><ruby>矮<rt>わい</rt></ruby><ruby>星<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>人<rt>じん</rt></ruby>サンジェルマン

text.en: A count who has been rumored to live for over 300 years. Immediately after he gets a haircut, he cannot fire his lasers.
text.ja: ３００年以上生きていると噂される伯爵。散髪した直後はビームが撃てない。

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Requiem of Destruction!!
